name: Zolok Woods
description:
You have been Banished to the infamous Zolok Woods where no leaf has ever came back from. Either they turn into flame spirits that show up during the Day or chilly ghost that show up during the Night. Survive TEN days and you are left untouched else turn into a spirit yourself.

Read controls before playing: 

WASD/arrow keys to move

Your sword will ward of enemies

Survive 10 days to win
